product_name: Swerve - Brown Sugar, 340g
short_description:
Make life a little sweeter with Swerve’s Brown Sugar! A natural sweetener without artificial ingredients. Just like sugar with zero calories! Sweet deal, right?

Key Information

  • Zero-calorie natural sweetener
  • Diabetes-safe
  • Measures, bakes, and cooks like sugar
  • Low glycemic index
  • Delicious flavour with no bitter aftertaste

Product Overview

Sweet tooth giving you grief? Make the switch to Swerve’s Brown Sugar! A delicious sweetener made from naturally sourced ingredients, it’s the perfect sugar alternative.

We know that sugar can wreak havoc on our bodies. Thankfully, Swerve’s Brown Sugar avoids a lot of those problems; it has little to no effect on blood glucose and insulin levels!

It’s derived from sweet, non-digestible carbohydrates found in certain starchy root vegetables and fruits.

With no artificial ingredients, flavourings, or preservatives and containing gut-friendly prebiotic fibre, it’s a fantastic choice for carb-conscious consumers.

When you hear it tastes just like sugar, bakes just like sugar, and even caramelizes just like sugar, you’ll realize that the sweetest dreams are made of Swerve!

Ingredients

Erythritol, Oligosaccharides, Vegetable Glycerin, Fruit Juice Concentrate (For Colour), and Natural Flavours.

Frequently Asked Questions

Oh no! My Swerve Brown Sugar has gone hard and clumpy. How do I fix this?

No need to worry, this happens sometimes! Swerve products can be a little sensitive to environmental factors like humidity and heat. It’s best to store it in a cool, dry place. If you’ve noticed that it is beginning to clump, popping it in the freezer can undo the effect the moisture has had on it.

Need it ready for action faster? You can pop it in a food processor and blitz or into the microwave for a few seconds (Swerve recommends 30 seconds).

short_description: Urad flour, also known as black gram flour or urad dal flour, is a type of flour made from ground urad dal, which is a type of lentil commonly used in Indian cuisine. Urad dal is skinned black lentils or split black gram, which are rich in protein, dietary fiber, and various nutrients. Urad flour is often used as a key ingredient in Indian dishes such as dosa (a type of savory crepe), idli (steamed rice cakes), vada (fried lentil fritters), and various snacks and sweets. It adds a distinctive flavor and texture to dishes and is a popular ingredient in vegetarian and vegan cooking due to its nutritional benefits.

short_description: Pride of India incorporates naturally-grown food and herbal products from India into our daily life. These all-natural ingredients help enhance the overall health of the human body. Pride of India is family owned and operated, and we manufacture our products in the USA. Our Himalayan Black Rock Salt is the purest form of salt available on planet Earth because it does not undergo any artificial treatment or refining processes. It is carved out from decades-old, naturally occurring salt reserves at the bed of the giant Himalayan mountains in the Indian subcontinent. The blackish appearance of our salt proves its purity. This coarse salt contains up to 84 essential minerals that are quintessential for the human body in daily nutrition. The grainy texture, distinct flavor, and easy solubility of our black salt make it great for kitchen use as well as in the bath. Black Himalayan salt contains sodium and other electrolytes that can help balance electrolytes, regulate hydration, balance PH levels, . Commercial table salt contains between 97.5% and 99.9% sodium chloride, while Himalayan salt only contains about 87%. Additionally, many table salts go through a bleaching process and may even contain harmful ingredients. Our Himalayan salt, however, is natural and doesn’t go through a refining process. Black salt can be used in salt lamps, as a salt substitute, in bath scrubs, or as a bath salt. It’s also a superior substitute for table salt. Use a pinch in your favorite recipe!

For your baking needs, use Wholesome Organic Raw Cane Turbinado Sugar as a crunchy topping on your favorite desserts such as cakes, cookies, muffins, crumbles, pies and even crème brûlée.

short_description: Get out your favourite sugar bowl and add class and sophistication to your table when company comes - not to mention a unique and memorable flavour in your drinks. Don’t reserve them for special occasions only, though. They’re too good not to enjoy them every day.

product_name: Rogers Fine Granulated White Sugar, 4kg Bag – Pure Cane Sugar for Baking, Cooking & Beverages
short_description:
Elevate your culinary creations with Rogers Fine Granulated Sugar Bag, 4KG! Sourced from natural cane sugar, this finely granulated sugar is meticulously refined in Canada to ensure purity and consistency. Its small, fine crystals dissolve quickly and evenly, making it an ideal choice for baking cookies, cakes, and breads, or sweetening beverages like coffee and tea. Perfect for home cooks, professional bakers, or small food service operations, this 4KG single-unit bag offers a convenient, resealable package to keep sugar fresh and free from moisture. Add a delicate, sweet touch to your recipes with this high-quality, all-natural sweetener.
 
Key Features
  • 4KG Single Bag: Generous size for home or small-scale commercial use, yielding numerous servings.
  • All-Natural Cane Sugar: Never bleached, derived from cane plants for pure sweetness.
  • Fine Granulated Texture: Small crystals prevent caking and dissolve easily for baking and cooking.
  • Versatile Use: Ideal for desserts, breads, beverages, sauces, and frostings.
  • Canadian-Made: Refined by Rogers Sugar Inc., ensuring consistent quality and purity.
  • Resealable Packaging: Multiwall paper bag keeps sugar fresh and protected from moisture.
Why Choose This ItemThe Rogers Fine Granulated Sugar Bag, 4KG is a kitchen essential for its natural purity and versatile performance, making it perfect for both sweet and savory recipes. Its fine texture ensures smooth incorporation into batters, doughs, or beverages, while the cane sugar origin delivers a clean, delicate sweetness without artificial additives. The 4KG single-unit size is ideal for frequent bakers or small restaurants, offering value and convenience with resealable packaging. Customers praise its ability to create tender doughs and golden crusts, making it a reliable staple for anyone seeking consistent, high-quality results.
 
Preparation & Serving Details
  • Usage Instructions: Use as needed in recipes—no preparation required; measure directly from the bag for baking, cooking, or sweetening beverages.
  • Serving Suggestions: Perfect for baking cookies, cakes, or breads; sweeten coffee, tea, or lemonade; use in frostings, sauces, or homemade jams.
  • Serving Size: 1 tsp (4g) per serving; the 4KG bag yields approximately 1,000 servings.
  • Storage: Store in a cool, dry place in the resealable bag to maintain freshness and prevent clumping.

product_name: Verka Plain Gur, 1kg, Pack of 2
short_description: Discover the rich, natural sweetness of Verka Plain Jaggery (Pesi Gur), a traditional Indian delicacy now available in a convenient pack of 2 (1 kg each). Crafted from pure sugarcane juice and enhanced with permitted synthetic food colors for a vibrant appeal, this unrefined jaggery offers a wholesome alternative to refined sugar. Perfect for sweetening beverages, cooking, or enjoying as a healthy snack, each jar comes with a handy handle for easy storage and use. Imported by Verka Food International Limited in Canada, this product is made in an SQF-certified facility, ensuring top-quality and safety standards.

product_name: RedPath Sugar Dark Brown, 20 Kg
short_description:
For recipes that call for stronger, more dramatic flavours, this is your sugar. With a deeper caramel taste, Dark Brown Sugar adds body to rich, decadent sweets like ganache, brownies, and gingerbread, or mocha anything. It’s also the classic choice for BBQ sauces and marinades, syrups, and more. Use it for a sweet topping on a cozy bowl of hot cereal or a slice of toast, or a perky sprinkle on your favourite cold cereal.

A richer, stronger molasses flavour. This gives the Dark Brown Sugar its milder flavor with a subtle caramel undertone. From cooking to baking, to sprinkling atop pancakes or your warm apple pie, this brown sugar is sure to be an asset in your commercial kitchen! Use it where you want a more distinctive flavour for your baking or sprinkled on hot or cold cereals and toast.

Brown sugar is great for use as a sweetener in baked items, as well as increases moisture retention. Use this high quality brown sugar to make muffins, coffee cakes, and irresistibly rich chocolate chip cookies in your bakery, diner, or cafe! It's also a sweet addition to baked beans or sweet potatoes. Use it in syrups, glazes, or sauces, or play up its crumbly nature by using it as a topping for oatmeal, yogurt, fruit, and cobblers.

Key Features:

  • More dramatic flavours
  • A richer, stronger molasses flavour
  • Also the classic choice for BBQ sauces
  • Great for use as a sweetener in baked items
  • It's also a sweet addition to baked beans or sweet potatoes
